array.string: Manage Our Game is a project to develop an app that helps people organize their soccer games.
Porto Alegre is a city with lots of urban problems, with this app it will be possible to people report them to be quickly resolved.
An application that remembers you about what you have lent or borrowed from other people.
Working knowledge in programming languages such as C/C++, Objective C, Swift and Ruby.
Basic knowledge in programming languages such as R, Python and Java.
Experience in Agile Software Development methodologies such as Scrum and XP.
Basic knowledge in using big data and machine learning analytics on applications.
Student at BEPiD (Brazilian Educational Program of iOS Developers), an innovative program to qualify graduation students in developing for iOS.
Web developer in an open source project whose goal is to create a Web Conference System.
Member of the Mobilicare Project, a management system health to pacients with chronic diseases.
Development of an urban network that simulates the city traffic problems and creates solutions for them.
Computer Science since March 2012 at Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS).
